authorCredential.translatedString: Over 30 years in the technology industry.
authorCredential.description: Over 30 years in the technology industry.

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What do you think of Ilhan Omar calling for the \"dismantlement\" of the American political and economic systems? Are you on board with that? ", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Well, my first thought upon reading the question was \u201cI bet this is another right winger pretending she said things she really didn\u2019t.\u201d", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I was right.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Let\u2019s go with the Fox News reporting of what she said:", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "\u201cWe can\u2019t stop at criminal justice reform or policing reform,\u201d she said during an outdoor press conference. \u201cWe are not merely fighting to tear down the systems of oppression in the criminal justice system. We are fighting to tear down systems of oppression that exist in housing, in education, in health care, in employment, [and] in the air we breathe.\u201d", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": true, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Yeah, I\u2019m on board with that. There\u2019s a ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "lot", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": " of systemic racism in a", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " lot", "modifiers": {"italic": true}}, {"text": " of parts of our society and a significant number of people who are where they are economically because of things having been that way for a long time. They\u2019re better than they used to be, but there\u2019s still a ways to go.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "This illustrates it fairly well:", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-31ac163dbed9c30910202da3d145cfbe", "height": 1147, "width": 1400, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-16ac3101751d8c21a49127d42904dc96", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}]}
